other_tests.findings: The liver is normal in contour with no loss of signal to suggest hepatic steatosis; no concerning liver lesions; pericholecystic hyperemia within the liver; diffuse gallbladder wall edema with small stones and sludge evident; consistent with cholecystitis; common bile duct not dilated; suggestion of filling defect in distal common bile duct; pancreas shows signs of edema and small cysts; calcified hemorrhagic cyst in the left kidney.
